stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with Middle East Aviation Theme Includes Hawkeye Keylogger
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 25 December 2014, a phishing email was sent from info@mebaa.com with the subject "MIDDLE EAST BUSINESS AVIATION SHOW(REPORTS $ BROCHURE)". The email included a malicious link to a credential harvesting site at http://alter23.altervista.org/google.html. It also included the malicious attachment meba2014reportsandcatalog.rar (MD5: ee8184421b339b2a9b2ff3345bd26cd1), which contained the Hawkeye keylogger.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: ---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ---- From info@mebaa.com Thu Dec 25 15:06:21 2014 Return-Path: <info@mebaa.com> X-Original-To: [REDACTED] Delivered-To: [REDACTED] Received: from [REDACTED] ([REDACTED]) by ubuntu (Postfix) with ESMTPS id 497AFE7972A for <[REDACTED]>; Thu, 25 Dec 2014 14:32:30 +0000 (GMT) Subject: MIDDLE EAST BUSINESS AVIATION SHOW(REPORTS $ BROCHURE) X-SENDER-IP: [REDACTED] X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 5.6 Received: from [REDACTED] ([REDACTED]) by [REDACTED] with ESMTP/TLS/RC4-SHA; 25 Dec 2014 18:16:35 +0000 Received: from [REDACTED] (HELO [REDACTED]) ([REDACTED]) by [REDACTED] with ESMTP/TLS/DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA; 26 Dec 2014 04:46:13 +1030 X-SENDER-IP: 206.214.68.201 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 5.6 Received: from unknown (HELO mebaa.com) ([206.214.68.201]) by [REDACTED] with ESMTP; 25 Dec 2014 18:15:51 +0000 Reply-To: info@meeba.aero From: MEBA2014 <info@mebaa.com> To:[REDACTED] Date: 25 Dec 2014 10:15:48 -0800 Message-ID: <20141225101423.3EFFE62547CEF8B4@mebaa.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Disposition-Notification-To: davidfettt@gmail.com Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0012_352672A4.9D50C930" ---- END EMAIL HEADER ----

EmailMessageObj:Header.EmailMessageObj:Subject: MIDDLE EAST BUSINESS AVIATION SHOW(REPORTS $ BROCHURE)

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: A link to this URL was included in the email. It was identified as a credential harvesting site.
This attachment contained a commercial crimeware keylogger called Hawkeye (MD5: 48192cbca1003de018ebc616914b3d37).

This executable file is a crimeware keylogger called Hawkeye, as identified by the strings. Exfiltration can occur via various protocols. The specific C2 site for this incident was not identified but may be the URL "http://192.99.212.64/WebPanel/log.php?username=" according to other sources.

The Hawkeye Keylogger meba2014reportsandcatalog.exe (MD5: 48192cbca1003de018ebc616914b3d37) may have exfiltrated data to "http://192.99.212.64/WebPanel/log.php?username=".
IP addresses related to HawkEye keylogger exfiltration include the following:
31.220.16.223 31.220.16.243 31.170.164.69 31.170.164.145 31.170.165.106 31.170.165.133 31.170.165.192 31.170.165.196 31.170.165.231 192.99.212.64
The IP address 192.99.212.64 was also used as a HawkEye C2 site in a previous phishing campaign described in IB-15-10081.
